Footer collaboration

This is an alpha preview. All features and APIs can be expected to change!

The Footer features a special button which is dedicated to launching the Collaboration panel. It looks like this:

Note that the Footer doesn't automatically initialize (or resume) the collbaroration. The API for this will be provided elsewhere. Fortunately, you can also hide the collaboration button again.

If you find a bug or need a feature…
